name: Subway Train Surfers
description:
Rush Runner Train Surf 3d is a endless run game.Swip to move left or right to avoid hitting trucks, buses. jump or slide to avoid subway trains. Customize purchased thematic runner skins that you like! Get runner upgrades, such as amazing power-ups: coin magnet, jetpack, super jump, score multiplier, to improve your power ups in the stores. 

How to play
+ Swipe left to turn left
+ Swipe right to turn right
+ Swipe forward to jump
+ Swipe backward to scroll
+ Tap to slash, fight or throw shuriken

Features:
-Coin Mode Bonus
-Rush, surf in train rail
-Upgrade properties to get endless
